questions.subject: ComfyUI-Better-Strings
questions.question: What is the purpose of the Better String node in ComfyUI-Better-Strings?
questions.answer: The Better String node provides access to a primitive multi-line string, addressing the issue of primitive string nodes defaulting to a singleline string and cutting off content.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-Better-Strings
questions.question: Why would one need the Better String node if there already exists a primitive string node?
questions.answer: The Better String node offers the advantage of automatically defaulting to a multiline string, preventing string truncation and making it easier to work with longer strings.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-Better-Strings
questions.question: How can I use the Better String node in a workflow?
questions.answer: Connect the primitive string node to the Better String node. The Better String node will automatically display the entire string without truncation.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-Better-Strings
questions.question: How do I install ComfyUI-Better-Strings?
questions.answer: Navigate to ComfyUI/custom_nodes in your terminal and run the command `git clone https://github.com/HaydenReeve/ComfyUI-Better-Strings/`.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-Better-Strings
